DataElement.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Epiphysial Cartilage Performed Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No indicator related to if an tibial growth plate x-ray was obtained.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the radiographic assessment of epiphysial cartilage (growth plates).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..

Concepts.definition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

Property.preferredName: Epiphysis of the Bone Cartilage Performed
Property.preferredDefinition: The round end of the long bones. (NCI):A type of connective tissue composed of chondrocytes and an extracellular matrix, composed of collagen, elastin, and ground substance. There are three types of cartilage; namely elastic, hyaline, and fibrocartilage.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: The round end of the long bones.

A type of connective tissue composed of chondrocytes and an extracellular matrix, composed of collagen, elastin, and ground substance. There are three types of cartilage; namely elastic, hyaline, and fibrocartilage.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.
